title: Transform Survivor Guilt into Survival Motivation
brief: Channel guilt from surviving when others didn't into determination to honor their memory through survival.
steps: Acknowledge that survivor guilt is normal after tragic events with casualties.
Remind yourself that you cannot help the deceased by giving up your own survival.
Use survival as a way to honor fallen comrades by living for a greater purpose.
Focus on carrying on the work or mission of those who were killed.
Channel guilt into determination to survive so you can tell their story.
Remember that abandoning your chance to survive accomplishes nothing positive.
Seek meaning in your survival through helping others or completing important work.
warnings: Guilt feelings can prevent you from taking necessary survival actions.
The living who abandon their survival chance accomplish nothing - this is the greatest tragedy.
Survivor guilt can lead to self-destructive behavior if not properly channeled.
